lead_paragraph: Shares of Netflix soared after the company reported earnings late Monday that were far better than analysts expected.

headline.print_headline: Netflix and Health Care Lift Markets
headline.main: Netflix and Health Care Drive Wall St. Upward

snippet: Shares of Netflix soared after the company reported earnings late Monday that were far better than analysts expected....
abstract: Stocks rise briskly on good earning reports from Netflix, UnitedHealth Group and other firms.
